data.eml:eml: Morphological description and DNA barcoding of Hydrobaenus laticaudus Saether 1976 (Diptera: Chironomidae: Orthocladiinae) from Amur River basin (Russian Far East)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makarchenko, Eugenyi A., Makarchenko, Marina A., Semenchenko, Alexander A. (2019): Morphological description and DNA barcoding of Hydrobaenus laticaudus Saether 1976 (Diptera: Chironomidae: Orthocladiinae) from Amur River basin (Russian Far East). Zootaxa 4674 (2): 225-234, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.2.4
